monster_ball.name: Monster Ball
monster_ball.description: A device for catching wild monsters

great_ball.name: Great Ball
great_ball.description: A good ball with a higher catch rate than a Monster Ball

ultra_ball.name: Ultra Ball
ultra_ball.description: An ultra-high performance ball with excellent catch rate

ether.name: Ether
ether.description: Restores 10 PP to a single move

max_ether.name: Max Ether
max_ether.description: Fully restores the PP of a single move

max_elixir.name: Max Elixir
max_elixir.description: Fully restores the PP of all moves

revive.name: Revive
revive.description: Revives a fainted monster with half HP

max_revive.name: Max Revive
max_revive.description: Revives a fainted monster with full HP

rare_candy.name: Rare Candy
rare_candy.description: Increases a monster's level by 1. Cannot be used in battle.

escape_rope.name: Escape Rope
escape_rope.description: Allows instant escape from any battle

x_attack.name: X Attack
x_attack.description: Raises Attack stat for the current battle. Cannot use multiple times.

x_defense.name: X Defense
x_defense.description: Raises Defense stat for the current battle. Cannot use multiple times.

x_speed.name: X Speed
x_speed.description: Raises Speed stat for the current battle. Cannot use multiple times.

luck_charm.name: Luck Charm
luck_charm.description: Increases shiny encounter rate for a short time
